name: Command - Sparrow
description:
Genre: Real Time Strategy. 

Description: You play as a revolutionary group, trying to fight what you believe is injustice while the government have other plans for the country. 

Game version: A very early pre-alpha that is somewhat buggy and a little bit playable. The first mission. 

There are also a few key features missing so approach the game with an open mind.

Thank you and have fun!
